description: Add some lightweight comfort to your ski boots and ski days—thanks to the greatness that is responsibly sourced Merino wool. their PhD® Ski Light Elite Pattern features their Indestructawool™ technology for enhanced durability; their 4 Degree™ elite fit system for a dialed-in, performance-oriented fit; and their Virtually Seamless™ toe for enhanced in-boot comfort. They are designed with a wider welt to help ensure all-day comfort, targeted cushioning around the toe, heel, and shin, and body-mapped mesh zones help keep things breathable. Now, you have everything you need for your best day on the slopes yet.
name: Smartwool PhD Ski Targeted Cushion Pattern Over the Calf Socks - Mens
